Submodules¶

seeFretboard.NotePosition module¶

class seeFretboard.NotePosition.NotePositionsOnCurrentFretboard(string, fret)[source]¶

Bases: object

The NotePositionsOnCurrentFretboard class represents a position of a note on a guitar fretboard. It has two main attributes: the string number and the fret number. The class provides methods to get and set these attributes.

getFret()[source]¶

Returns the fret number of the note position.

Returns:

The fret number of the note position.

Return type:

int

getString()[source]¶

Returns the string number of the note position.

Returns:

The string number of the note position.

Return type:

int

setFret(fret)[source]¶

Sets the fret number of the note position.

Parameters:

fret (int) – The fret number of the note position.

setString(string)[source]¶

Sets the string number of the note position.

Parameters:

string (int) – The string number of the note position.
